changeSet.author: Lucas Reeh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.songs ( id bigint NOT NULL, title character varying(1000) NOT NULL, url character varying(1000) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT songs_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: Lucas Reeh
